Home.desc: Opaj Consulting Inc specializes in providing professional services for managing Enterprise JD Edwards upgrade, implementation projects and support. We use proven tools, a time-tested project plan and leading industry processes. We can significantly reduce project risks while ensuring that the maximum business benefits are achieved.
features: JDE EnterpriseOne, JDE World, IQ4BIZ, UPK, Support, Training

Services.desc: Oracle's  JD Edwards services are going strong in the wake of Supply Chain & Digital Transformations. Opaj Consulting Inc  specializes in implementing and integrating on-premise solutions for companies across multiple industries and sizes.

Aboutus.heading: What Business Demands
Aboutus.desc1: Our mission is to offer comprehensive solutions focused around complete integration of Enterprise Business
Aboutus.img_text: Deliver enterprise solutions covering business portfolios ranging from

ManagedServies.s1: Provide 24/7 on-call support, technical and functional, or staff augmentation. We provide SLA based phone and email support
ManagedServies.s2: Provide case basis Business Analysis and Feature enhancement consulting solutions
ManagedServies.s3: Provide  JD Edwards Development & Customizations  Services - Custom Code development , Orchestration & Alerts , Report Development , Digital Form & Print Solutions
ManagedServies.s4: UI User Interface development , E1Cafe, Watch List, E1 Pages and much more
ManagedServies.s5: Provide JD Edwards CNC System Administration Services & Scheduler Automation . System Performance Monitoring services and alerts
ManagedServies.s6: Provide JD Edwards Role Based Security Configuration & Support Services
ManagedServies.s7: Applications have bugs, require changes , and grow obsolete over time. As we are a value shop our experienced with client managed services can help optimize and stabilize application originally written where  deveopment  and documentation was poorly written and implemented
